roleset.name: suffering a low neutrophil count (blood level)
roleset.note: NEUTROPENIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SRED. (from neutropenic.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Our patient was neutropenic since she was admitted to hostipal and she was receiving prednisolone for 27 days.
example.arg: since she was admitted to the hospital
